Instance.description: A notebook entry specific to Plants. This populates the entry automatically, and displays static data for a specific plant (e.g. rarity, seasonality, etc...)

Tunable.name: entry_text_rarity
Tunable.description: The text to display for rarity. e.g.: Rarity: {0.String}

Tunable.name: entry_text_splicing
Tunable.description: The text to display for a single splicing entry. e.g.: Splice with {P0.ObjectName} to get {P1.ObjectName}.

Tunable.name: entry_text_value
Tunable.description: The text to display for the fruit's Simoleon value. e.g.: Average Harvestable Value: {0.Money}
